E

Enemy - Class in system
The Enemy class represents the enemies in the Bomberman Game.
Enemy(int, int) - Constructor for class system.Enemy
creates an enemy at location (x,y) and loads an image at that location
EscapeAction - Class in actions
The EscapeAction class represents the code that is triggered when the escape key is pressed.
EscapeAction(GameStatus) - Constructor for class actions.EscapeAction
This method initializes a game status class to be used by the other function.
EscapeMenuPanel - Class in panels
The class MainMenuPanel represents the main menu of the Bomberman game.
EscapeMenuPanel(GameStatus) - Constructor for class panels.EscapeMenuPanel
This method creates the five different panels available in the main menu of the bomberman game.
explodeBomb(int) - Method in class system.GamePhysics
This method explodes the bomb and sets the size of the explosion.
Explosion - Class in system
The class Explosion represents the event that occurs when the Bomb dies.
Explosion(int, int) - Constructor for class system.Explosion
This method creates the explosion at location (x,y) and loads the appropriate image.
